body.name: Haddockway Portable Washing Machine,Compact Laundry Washer Energy Saving,1.77Cu.ft Top Load Washer,10 Programs 5 Water Leves,Full-automatic Washer and Spinner with LED Display/Drain Pump for Home,Dorm
features: 👗【2-IN-1 Top Load Washer】Designed with fully automatic system, equipped with single cylinder and drainage pump. High quality and durable motor provides stable power. Efficient spinning spin drying can quickly dry clothes and expel 90% water. Moreover, the washing and spinning can be used separately to optimize the laundry program and reduce the excessive consumption of electricity and water. Save your time and energy and finish the laundry easily.

👖【Portable & Large Capacity】Compact and lightweight, this portable washing machine also features 2 handle positions on the side and 2 rollers on the bottom for easy mobility. The honeycomb stainless steel inner tub can hold up to 1.77 Cu.ft clothes at a time and it can wash a lot of clothes for you. Great for small spaces, able to store easily, ideal for apartments, dorms, RVs, camping.

🥋【360°Tumbling Cleaning 】Topped with a transparent cover, you can monitor the washing situation and the status of your clothes at any time. The delicate stainless steel inner tub has a built-in filter with tightly welded seams to prevent clothes from hooking and abrasion, to satisfy people's need for premium clothes washing and care. Ensures gentle yet effective cleaning without causing damage. Say bye-bye to hand washing!

👙【Easy to Operate】This laundry washer offers 10 washing programs and 5 water level settings. You can flexibly choose one or more programs to customize your washing process to meet your different laundry needs. One-button operation makes it simple and labor-saving, and the LED indicator will show the remaining washing time. You can set the child lock function to lock the machine, once you open the lid the machine will stop running and sound an alarm to protect your family's safety.

👚【Automatic Unbalance Detection】Featuring Automatic Unbalance Detection (AUD), it automatically corrects imbalance problems in the tub to avoid drastic vibration if the clothes were not distributed equally. In addition, there is 1 foot on the bottom to adjust the height to fit uneven floors. Vibration and noise reduction, smooth operation and quiet washing.

🧺【Thorough Cleaning & Spinning Cycles】260W Washing Power and 230W Spinner Power. 360° tumbling washing easily gets rid of stubborn stains and provides optimal cleaning and rinsing performance. Press the button of “Program/Delay” at the same time 3 seconds to turn on the delayed wash function. Save you a lot of hassles. It is your good helper!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CHILD LOCK & AUTO SHUT-OFF Don't worry about children accidentally touch the washing machine. Opening the lid while running will trigger an alarm and all programs will stop running. Bring more safety for your family! 24 HOURS SMART DELAY FUNCTION Scheduling a washing appointment will save a big hassle for you. You can press the "Program/Delay" button to select the desired startup time and flexibly organize your time and reduce constraints.

Thoroughly Clean for a Healthy Lifestyle Portable Washing Machine with Fully Automatic Operation Our portable fully automatic laundry washer is equipped with a powerful motor and drain pump for precise control of the wash rhythm, providing excellent cleaning performance. Washing and spinning can be used separately, save time, save labor, save water and save electricity. It is a household essential product. Large Capacity But CompactAutomatic unbalance detection function (AUD)Equipped with drain pump and extended drain pipeHigh quality and durable motor, providing stable power

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This little machine is amazing and can handle quite a bit. Excellent value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: By the time I write this review, I have only used this a handful of times. I got the 2.1 cu size and I am impressed. It advises that you only use cold water, no big deal, but I have noticed that a small puddle appears from the middle of the machine after the washing is done. This isn't a turn off for me, but it might be user error (Too much water, too many clothes, etc.) [*it was user error]. There is a normal and standard mode, but I don't know what the difference is and the manual doesn't describe the settings.When the cycle is done, my clothes come out a little damp. The washing cycle is good enough to get rid of grease stains. The whole body of the machine is made of plastic but I would recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You cannot have to lid open while it's going at all.
reviews.reviewText: How really like this washer. It is really quiet. It is really nice to have all those settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This seller is giving me problems to return this item even though it came with a defect. I have been waiting since December 22 for a shipping label included. This product is leaking water as if it has already been used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Funcionó por casi 2 meses
reviews.reviewText: Funcionó por caso dos meses la lavadora dejó de exprimir, el último ciclo se notaba que se esforzaba y saque la ropa mojada. Intente darle solo el ciclo para exprimir y no lo hizo. Aún esta en garantía se devuelve.Era muy cómodo su tamaño lamento que se dañara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PEQUEÑA PERO EXCELENTE
reviews.reviewText: Cuando la vi, me parecio que no iba a poder lavar casi ropa, pero me sorprendio cuando le pude agregar mas ropa de lo que pense, y lava muy bien, ya la recomende entre mis conocidos porque no me decepciono!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome seller! Great machine
reviews.reviewText: Machine works very well! It spin dries but my a complete dry, so you will need a dryer. Other than that, very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mom loves it
reviews.reviewText: Bought one for my mother who has limited space in her house for a washer. We were able to find this one which is the perfect size. We connected it to her existing washer connection after replacing the factory hose that came with it. She’s saved so much in laundry fees! Wish is dried better though but other than that it’s perfect.
